name: A I R
description:
Ludum Dare 38 Compo
Take to flight, exploring small planets! A game experimenting with the Godot Engine's 3D, and 3D development in general

Controls:

  • Turn - Keyboard / D Pad
  • Flap - Space / Face button
  • Dive - Down (when high)
  • Warp - Space / Face button (when planet in sight)
  • Pause- Enter / Start button

Go through hoops to widen your range of sight, enabling more planets to visit!

Source: https://github.com/NykolaR/ld38

Twitter: https://twitter.com/NykolaR
